content: I just noticed this PR again: it is opened from a fork, hence did not appear in the review queue. Is this PR still relevant? @Matthew Ballard you were mentioned on the PR, can you say more about the PR? Thanks!
I think its fine in principal. It needs to be tested with a clean MacOS (ie nothing .profile etc for elan or vscode) before being merged.
I submitted this without having previously installed VSCode or lean, so on my end it was from a clean build.
